segments.text: I like playing computer games , but I'm not really into board games .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how about individual games like the Rubik's cube or solitaire ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: the Rubik's cube is so difficult to solve that I think it should be banned !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: if I taught you how to do it , I'm sure you could solve it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: how did you figure out how to slove the Rubik's cube ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't really have to figure it out . I just followed the instructions !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had no idea there were a set of instructions . I thought everyone who could solve it were all geniuses !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: hints are really important when you're solving puzzles . If you give me some hints about playing that PS2 game , I â€™ ll show you how to solve the Rubik's cube .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: do you remember , years ago , when everybody at the New Year's party had yo-yos ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yeah . That was a strange party . Can you still do any of those yo-yo tricks ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . I haven't tried yo-yo since that party !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could never figure out how to use my yo-yo .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: if you don't start when you're young , it's hard to get the hang of it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: let's get started with this game then .
segments.speaker: S2
